thread.title: GH Recap: Liv unleashes a plan on an unsuspecting Ava
thread.title_full: GH Recap: Liv unleashes a plan on an unsuspecting Ava

title: GH Recap: Liv unleashes a plan on an unsuspecting Ava
text:
GH Recap: Liv unleashes a plan on an unsuspecting Ava 
Dustin Cushman Tuesday, February 14th, 2017 
Tuesday February 14, 2017: Julian pleads with Liv, Finn suffers from withdrawals, Ava finds herself in hot water, and Sonny threatens Nelle. Pin 
At Liv’s place, Liv tells Julian that Buzz is at the station selling Ava out as they speak. Julian tells her that pinning this on Ava won’t work, but Liv has a plan in place. He can’t believe she is framing their own sister. Liv is touched that Julian cares so much for Ava, and wishes he felt that way about her instead of trying to murder her. Julian begs her to forgive him and enjoy the family they have, then she wouldn’t feel alone. Liv thinks about it and smiles, but snaps to and tells Julian that he and Ava deserve what they have coming. Liv dismisses Julian, but he wants to know what else she could possibly do to him. 
Spotlight on... Pondering Curtis and Jordan's romantic possibilities on Valentine's Day 
At the PCPD, a petrified Buzz is sure that Ava’s voice belongs to the woman who ordered him to plant the bomb. He freaks out that she knows he is here. Jordan promises him that she will protect him, and she has two officers take him to a safe house. Jordan goes in to the interrogation room to see Ava and tells her that their witness has identified her. Ava is furious and says they have no real case against her. Jordan tells her they are gathering evidence as they speak. Later, Dante returns with some of the things they found at Ava’s place, including a lease to the herb shop where she met with Julian that is signed by Ava and a martini glass with her DNA on it. Ava swears she’s being framed, but Dante arrests her for Morgan’s murder. 
At GH, Finn snaps at Hayden and asks if she fired the entire nursing staff. She tells him they organized a sickout and is shocked by his tone. Finn heads off to pop a pill, but he’s down to his last one, and his jittery hands cause him to lose it. 
Liz and Franco relax at home when Griffin drops by with some pain meds for Franco, and encouraging words for Liz about the nurses’ strike. After he leaves, Franco makes snarky remarks about Griffin, which causes Liz to realize he’s suspicious of Griffin. She tells him to stop being so insecure and asks if she’s given him a reason to be jealous. He tells her no, so she asks if she can help him with his jealousy. He responds that it is his thing to work on. Liz says someday he’ll have to tell her why he sees other men as a threat to his happiness. 
Michael drops by the Metro Court for a drink to clear his head. He tells Nelle that he agreed to the hospital layoffs and feels guilty about it. She tells him sometimes you must do the right thing even if it hurts a lot of people. Michael gets a text about the nurses’ strike and has to head out. 
Related: Promo: Red hot Valentine's Day in Port Charles 
Sonny finds the bra Nelle hid in his bedroom and murmurs, “Nelle you bitch!” Sonny shoves the bra in his pocket just as Carly walks into the room. Carly decides to head home to be with Michael and Joss and try and process the news that Ava may be behind Morgan’s death. 
Griffin returns to GH and finds Finn struggling with his pain. Finn asks Griffin for more pills, but they are interrupted when Carly arrives looking for Michael. After she leaves, Griffin suggests Finn see a specialist for his back. Griffin notices Finn’s hands are unsteady, which Finn claims is nothing and walks off. Finn manages to track down the pill he lost earlier behind a nurse’s cart and pops it into his mouth. Meanwhile, Michael arrives and learns about the sickout from Hayden. Later, Carly finds Michael and gives him the news that Ava is the new suspect in Morgan’s death, but that Jason isn’t convinced she’s guilty. She tells Michael everything she knows, including that Sonny has been cleared. Elsewhere, Hayden begins doing some of the nurse’s duties and is shocked to see Amy show up to help her. Hayden thinks she’s doing this to get her job back, and she warns this could bring trouble with the other nurses. Hayden hires her back and gives Amy her word that she won’t be fired again. 
Sonny drops by the Metro Court after it is closed and confronts Nelle with her bra. She acts innocent and claims she forgot it, but Sonny knows she planted it when she was there earlier. Sonny warns her she’s a problem, and that she is in way over her head. Sonny threatens if she comes near his house or jeopardizes his family again he’ll make her go away permanently. Sonny leaves, and Nelle plots to tell Carly everything. 
Dillon surprises Kiki for Valentine’s Day. 
Nathan tries to patch things up between Nina and Maxie. 
Curtis meets with a woman and asks her to be his Valentine. 
Ava brings Scotty in as her lawyer. 
Anna tells Andre that she sanctioned Valentin’s assassination.
